Service Details: Provides opportunities for retired and semi-retired business and professional people for fellowship, to listen to guest speakers and participation in various activities as determined by the members in individual clubs such as Bridge, dining In, dining out, walking and just being friends
Cost: Membership ; Annual Dues of $25 due at the end of June
Meetings: Last Monday of most months * opens at 9am for a 9:30am start * coffee at 10:30am, followed by a speaker * usually finishes about 11:45am with an optional casual lunch
